Class Database

java.lang.Object
  cinemabooking.Database

public class Database
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for handling database connections (Should load settings)

Field Summary
private  DatabaseConfig config
          The type of Database: mysql/mssql/local
private  java.sql.Connection connection
          Database Connection
private  java.lang.String connectionUrl
          Full connection url
private  java.lang.String location
          Derby local db folder path
 
Constructor Summary
Database()
          Initializes class variables with settings saved in Config Class
 
Method Summary
private  void connect()
          Connects to the database using the saved settings from Config Class if no preferences are found then the connection is reverted to a local db.
 java.sql.ResultSet runQuery(java.lang.String sql)
          Runs a query using the instance Connection object, must be instanced first
 void runUpdate(java.lang.String sql)
          Runs an update to the database, returns no results.
